name: Containment Cell
description: A spartan containment cell. The walls are bare, and a single cot is bolted to the floor.

wall_scratchings.description: Faint scratchings on the wall read: 'They're always watching.'

name: Sterile Hallway
description: A long, sterile hallway stretching to the north and south.

name: Sterile Hallway
description: A long, sterile hallway stretching to the east and west.

name: Hallway Corner
description: The hallway turns here, leading north and east.

name: Hallway Corner
description: The hallway turns here, leading north and west.

name: Hallway Corner
description: The hallway turns here, leading south and east.

name: Hallway Corner
description: The hallway turns here, leading south and west.

name: Vacant Office
description: A small, tidy office. A single desk sits in the corner. The computer terminal is dark.

desk.description: A standard office desk. The drawers are empty.

terminal.description: The computer terminal is offline. A sticky note on the monitor has 'skill_basic_lockpicking' written on it.
